OOC I haven't decided how many mutants I'll create or what they'll be yet,
I'll decide when I get enough samples. OK, forget about Razor Claw slapping
the two on the back.

Lunarpine pulled his hand back, withdrawing from the handshake. "Yes, I'm
Lunarpine." he remembered the battles at the ark and how he still had a few
bots he'd like a rematch with. He turned toward Klant, ":Whos your friend?"
he asked trying to change the subject. He figured that Torca must have heard
Ice's introduction.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 07, 2000 5:44 AM
Subject: Re: At the meeting


> OOC: Are you planning on making mutants out ALL the DNA smaples you
> collect?
>
> :::Torca:::
>
> ::He wondered why this guy thought meeting him was an honor, but he
> didnt say anyhting::
> Torca: Same to you. Lunarpine, right?  We defended the ark, before it
> was destroyed.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lunarpine accepts the extended hand of Torca, "It's an honor to
> finally meet you face to face." Lunarpine wasn't thinking about
> meeting this allie, he was more concerned about the crowd and losing
> the other two members of his team.
> >
> > Ice mentally scanned the room for Razor Claw. she was worried about
> the consequences if he lost his temper.
> >
> > "I'm fine commander." Razor Claw hsd sensed her concern and thought
> to reassure her that he wasn't about to do anything stupid. Anything
> that is that he knew of. He approached Angel Prime and Magnus. "Great
> party that the maximals are throwing." he boasts obnoxiously as he
> slaps both of them on the back.
> >
> > OOC Partly right, fuzors are close to mutants. Torca is part
> elephant and part Orca whale, those are both new samples in
> themselves.
